DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to compare the effects of treatment of two different formulations of AngeliqÂ® and Prempro on blood pressure in post-menopausal women with prehypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Angeliq and Prempro on Blood Pressure and Sodium Sensitivity in Postmenopausal Women With Prehypertension
DOC.detailed_description: This study has previously been posted by Berlex, Inc. Berlex, Inc. has been renamed to Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc.Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is the sponsor of the trial.
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women 45 65 years old with prehypertension Hormone therapy (estrogen/progestin)
